video.title: Voice
video.synopsis: A deft detective whose wife is killed by a serial murderer teams up with a rookie cop, a gifted voice profiler dealing with her own father’s murder.

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk's wife is murdered. Kwon-joo, who spoke to the victim before her death, testifies that the suspect Dong-chul did not commit the crime.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The Golden Time Team is established and is given six months to prove its worth. Jin-hyuk gets chosen by Kwon-joo to join the team.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk rushes to find Ah-ram, a 7-year-old boy whose mother stabbed him with a knife, while Kwon-joo keeps the barely conscious boy on the phone.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Park Eun-soo calls in to report that her sister Eun-byul, the granddaughter of the woman who runs the eatery Jin-hyuk frequents, has been kidnapped.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Kwon-joo has been abducted while tracking down the person who kidnapped Eun-byul. Jin-hyuk fights against time to find her before it is too late.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Kwon-joo is shaken after hearing Kyung-il say her father's last words. The team receives a call about a man threatening an older woman with a weapon.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk's team discovers a woman's dead body in the apartment full of trash, but the mystery only deepens as they dig further to find the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Kwon-joo tracks down where Jin-hyuk is being held from what Kyung-il said with his dying breath. A serial killer emerges.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk and Kwon-joo learn what the message on the mirror could mean. The team discovers they may not know who Oh Hyun-ho really is.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: The Golden Time Team realizes they were being played when they learn that Hyun-ho's stalker is after Eun-soo's life.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A murder has occurred at a luxurious club. The police orders everyone inside to stay put, but a couple of VIPs manage to slip away.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk makes a shocking discovery when he gets to the mental hospital after hearing from Kwon-joo that Baek Jin-goo might be in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jin-hyuk receives a call from Sang-tae: If Jin-hyuk agrees to let him go, he will tell him who the real killer is and provide him with proof.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: After hearing him speak, Kwon-joo becomes convinced that Tae-goo is the killer. Kwon-joo suspects that a powerful entity is protecting Tae-goo.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: A horrible bus accident reveals the evil deeds of Sungwun Express. Jin-hyuk tracks down a spy within the police organization.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Moo Jin-hyuk and Kang Kwon-joo put their lives on the line as they finally have a direct confrontation with Mo Tae-goo.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The Golden Time Team continues to meet crime head-on. They respond to a subway bomb threat, but team leader Kyung-hak is yet to arrive at the scene.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that her suspect did not act alone, Kwon-joo considers her next move, and how best to rein in the unpredictable detective Kang-woo.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A recently released sexual predator is accused of a kidnapping. As Kang-woo heads to the scene, he runs into the man he believes is haunting him.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: While in custody, a suspect dies of an apparent heart attack. Later, Kang-woo receives a message from the real and elusive mastermind.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Kang-woo and his team mobilize to rescue Park's wife from a kidnapper. But they clash with Chief Inspector Na's unit, which also wants the same man.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The Golden Time Team begins to investigate Chief Na, but when one member gets overzealous in his search, they unwittingly alert their target.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A popular vlogger swears he has encountered a zombie, which goes on to attack more people. Skeptical, the investigators mobilize to uncover the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Na plants more seeds of suspicion in Kwon-joo's mind, telling her of Kang-woo's past and bouts of amnesia. Eun-soo is threatened by an ex-boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Amid suspicions that Eun-soo may have played a part in a stabbing, the team arrests its suspects. But they notice evidence of yet another accomplice.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Clues suggest Na is in danger. Later, an injured man resembling Kang-woo is spotted hobbling away from a bloody crime scene — where Na's ID is found.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Cleared of suspicion, Kang-woo reveals his wretched past to Kwon-joo. Later, the true serial killer attacks Seo-yool and gives Kwon-joo an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Je-soo turns himself in, leading to an intense face-off with Kang-woo. An unexpected play from Je-soo launches Kwon-joo and Kang-woo into action.
episodes.title: Episode 12
